name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Richard DEMARCO, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Richard DEMARCO, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 24th day of July, 2001, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, limited to the following issue:
Whether appellant was entitled to a jury charge on the defense of duress under 18 Pa.C.S. § 309.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
778 A.2d 620
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Richard DEMARCO, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 24, 2001.
